tuv.seg: All employees are entitled by law to a written statement of salary
Bíonn gach fostaí i dteideal faoin dlí ráiteas scríofa tuarastail a fháil
This statement is called a 'pay slip'
'Pádhuille' a thugtar ar an ráiteas sin
Find out about your rights here
Faigh amach faoi do chearta anseo
Under the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 most employees are entitled to a minimum wage
Faoin Acht um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta 2000 tá an chuid is mó d'fhostaithe i dteideal íosráta pá
Your P45 and P60 certificates
Do theastais P45 agus P60
Your employer is responsible for paying your PRSI contributions and must give you a P60 or a P45 when you leave
Tá d'fhostóir freagrach as do chuid ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC a íoc agus caithfidh sé/sí P60 nó P45 a thabhairt duit nuair atá tú ag fágáil?
When you are regularly paid late
Nuair a íoctar déanach thú go rialta
If your employer is regularly late when paying your wages then there are procedures you can use to enforce your legal right to your pay
Má tá d’fhostóir á d’íoc déanach go rialta tá nósanna imeachta gur féidir leat a úsáid chun do cheart dlíthiúil a fheidhmiú agus do phá a fháil

Employees can get certain benefits in addition to their salary or wages. Some of these benefits are taxed. This document provides information on how such benefits are taxed
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na príomhshochair gur féidir le fostaí a fháil sa bhreis ar a t(h)uarastal/pá agus conas a ngearrtar cáin ar na sochair sin
